jhelp.android.api.view

Class ListFilerableAdapter<ELEMENT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.android.api.view.ListFilerableAdapter<ELEMENT>
  • Type Parameters:
    ELEMENT - Element inside adapter type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    FilterListener

    public abstract class ListFilerableAdapter<ELEMENT>
extends java.lang.Object
implements FilterListener
    Generic adapter for easily add, remove, sort, show, hide elements in android.view.ListView.
    For show/hide elements, its based on a Filter
    Author:
    JHelp
